title: Large bedroom in spacious 2 br
description:
AVAILABLE SEPTEMBER 1ST
Large bedroom available in a shared 2-bedroom, 1 bathroom. Near the corner of Haverford and Lancaster in West Philly.
The apartment is 2 floors, the second and third of the building. First floor neighbors are quiet, friendly, and reliable.
2nd floor: large living room, modern kitchen with granite countertops, all appliances, and a dishwasher. walk-in laundry room, shared bathroom, large bedroom (available).
3rd floor: roof deck, office/studio, storage closet, and occupied bedroom.
The house has central A/C. There is plenty of street parking on the block. 40 bus stop and trolley lines are at the corner. Subway station is within walking distance. The neighbors are friendly and helpful. Responsive landlord.
Available Bedroom:
The spacious bedroom on the second floor has a closet and large window pointing towards the backyard. This unfurnished, hardwood floor bedroom is $550/month + shared utilities (avg >$100/mo). The room is available September 1st.
Potential applicants MUST be clean, respectful, and pay the rent and bills on time. Existing tenant is looking for other young professionals (ages 25-35)
Must pass background checks, have valid forms of ID, and have references upon applying.

title: beautiful 3 beds and 2 full baths
description: This roomy Wynnefield home has a mix of updates, lots of character great convenient location and off-street parking. The home is ready for quick occupancy. This is a bright and airy 3 bedroom row home and features original hardwood flooring in most rooms. Enter into a comfortable foyer/sitting room. Hardwood floors are throughout the generous living room and spacious dining room. The large kitchen features ample cabinetry. On the 2nd floor there are three good sized bedrooms, each with hardwood flooring and closets. The lower level offers direct access to the rear alley for parking. The former garage could easily be converted back if desired. You will also find a separate utility room and an additional storage area. This is a great home in a great location - close to the Main Line, five minute drive to access I-76, 15 minutes to Center City, close to 3 bus routes, and 2 regional rail lines as well as a short walk to the St. Joseph University campus and a myriad of shopping and dining options that the City Line corridor has to offer.

description:
KEY FEATURES
Square Footage: 2100 sqft
Bedrooms: 3 Beds
Bathrooms: 2.5 Baths

Roof Deck with unobstructed Skyline Views

DESCRIPTION:
Property offers 3 bedrooms, flex space, finished basement with 2 1/2 baths spread over 2,100 square feet of modern living space. Roof top deck with stunning panoramic skyline city views. 1 off-street parking included. Stunning kitchen with quartz counter top and all brand new energy efficient appliances. Hardwood floors throughout the whole house. Inquire quickly!
The natural light filled open floor plan with large windows on the 1st level contains the living room, dining area, half bath and modern kitchen.
The kitchen comes equipped with stainless steel appliances - gas range stove, microwave, and dishwasher, refrigerator with water and ice dispenser - double sink with garbage disposal, quartz counter top and a tile backslash with modern twist. Large window in the kitchen. All three bedrooms are large and each have built-in closets making this ideal for roommates, a family or anyone who desires some extra space. All baths have modern fixtures & vanities; 1 have bathtub and the other one has a large tiled shower with all glass doors. Master bedroom located on 2nd level, 2nd and 3rd bedrooms located on 3rd level.
This property is Located in the heart of Fishtown, it is within walking distance to many options for dining, cafes and shopping. The home comes with 1 Off-street parking in the back of the house with the private entrance. Easy access to public transportation if needed, Located half a block from Frankford Avenue and 1 block from Subway station.
Central Air, Forced hot air heat, gas, furnace, wired for cable. Security System installed (not activated), if tenant chooses to use the security system - they will have to activate it ($35-45/ month)
LEASE TERMS:
First month, Last month, one month security deposit due at lease signing. $50 application fee per applicant. Tenants responsible for all utilities: water, gas, electricity, cable/internet, security system (not required).

title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home with Wood Floors, Package Room, Lounge
description:
The studio apartment home at 2411 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 24th floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as August 26, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* Package lockers
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Studio apartment home on 24th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large south-facing windows
* View of Chancellor Street
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)

description: Welcome to the nicest unit in Hilltop! Perfect for rental. The unit is located on the ground floor and on the corner, making it the largest sized 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom style in the complex, all while being built in 2019! The home offers both ramp and step access to the front door. With both front and side windows, the open area space offers an abundance of natural light for your living and dining areas. The modern flooring is both water and pet proof and all the windows are deep set with wide windowsills. The kitchen offers all stainless-steel appliances with exceptional cabinet and counter top space. The open area is enough to have both kitchen and dining room tables, as well as a spacious living room and alcove office area. The large bathroom has matching ceramic tile for the flooring and shower area, with a stunning sink vanity and large mirror. The generous bedroom has a large front window with a courtyard view. The large courtyard is decorated with flowers and trees, including a brick walkway pointing directly at you. It is one of the few units in the complex with an open view. This unit also comes with in-unit washer and dryer, and central A/C. With less than a mile ride to 3 grocery stores, multiple restaurants, gyms, and banks, this unit is perfect for your new home!
